DOC.brief_title: Air Barrier System Prevention Prosthesis-related Infections
DOC.detailed_description: This project evaluation novel device , Air Barrier System ( ABS ) , reduce risk prosthesis-related surgical site infection multi-center clinical trial . The ABS shield surgical incision intra-operatively create field high-purity air surround incision prevents airborne microorganism enter incision . This research evaluate ABS performance prospective , randomize , blind multi-center trial . The surgical procedure study include total hip arthroplasty , trauma-related acetabulum reconstruction , posterior instrument spine fusion , prosthetic vascular graft procedure . Patients enrol first two year study , CDC guideline require one year follow-up period monitor patient potential prosthesis-related infection .
